swal.title: New in permacast V2 ‚ú®
swal.html:
• Generate a Spotify & Apple-compliant RSS feed for any podcast
  • Tip your favorite podcasts with $NEWS
  • Episodes are atomic NFTs, listable on Verto!

swal.title: Install ArConnect to continue
swal.text: Permablog uses ArConnect to make it easier to authenticate and send transactions for questions and answers

uploadshow.title: Add a new show
uploadshow.label: You'll add episodes to the show next.
uploadshow.name: Show name
uploadshow.author: Author

showadded.title: Show added
showadded.text: Show added permanently to Arweave. Check in a few minutes after the transaction has mined.

uploadfailed.title: Unable to add show
uploadfailed.text: Check your wallet balance and network connection

reset.text: Podcast cover image is not squared (1:1 aspect ratio)!

uploading.title: Uploading, please wait a few seconds...

swal.title: Coming soon
swal.text: Tip your favorite podcasts with $NEWS to show support

upload.title: Upload underway!
upload.text: We'll let you know when it's done. Go grab a ‚òï or üç∫

uploadcomplete.title: Upload complete
uploadcomplete.text: Episode uploaded permanently to Arweave. Check in a few minutes after the transaction has mined.

uploadfailed.title: Upload failed
uploadfailed.text: Check your AR balance and network connection

uploadepisode.title: Add new episode to
uploadepisode.name: Episode name
uploadepisode.verto: List as an Atomic NFT on Verto?

nopodcasts: No podcasts here yet. Upload one!
